Unique AngelSense Capabilities

Diary Schedule

See your child’s routes and locations throughout the day

Text Alerts

Listen to your child environment from anywhere and at any time

Smart Search

Track your child in case of an emergency using a unique 'Runner Mode'

Non-Removable Wearables

GPS wearables that address sensory sensitivities of special children

Powerful feature designed to get the help of others to find a missing child

About AngelSense

AngelSense grew out of a mission to create a safer world for children with special needs who tend to wander, get lost, and experience improper care. As a result, cutting-edge technology was developed to bring you the most accurate tracking and monitoring solution. With AngelSense, you can assure that your loved ones are safe and secure at all times.
